summary: 18 new alteration spells that fortify skills just as potions do.
descriptionHtml:
If you want to use these spells in Restoration school, see my new and improved mod - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9122]Old School Spells[/url]

18 new alteration spells that fortify skills just like potions do.

Example:
Fortify Smithing == Blacksmith\'s Elixir

All can be purchased from Tolfdir at Mages College.
Their price is high but it\'s worth it.
No dual cast because they become overpowered.
author: Culverine
